name: Rep. Tony C√°rdenas
tweet_text: Short version -- the @SenateGOP  should support the @HouseDemocrats plan that puts workers and American families first rather than push a bill that prioritizes big corporations.

name: Rep. Tony C√°rdenas
tweet_text: This crisis has put a strain on the U.S. economy and small businesses are in need of immediate relief. Our plan provides $500 billion in grants and interest-free loans to help Main Street businesses as they cope with the economic disruption caused by the COVID19 pandemic.

name: Rep. Tony C√°rdenas
tweet_text: As more people go to the hospital due to #COVID19, the cost on hospitals to treat patients will increase. Our plan provides more than $150 billion to supporting community hospitals and health centers treating coronavirus patients ensuring they have the resources to continue.

name: Rep. Tony C√°rdenas
tweet_text: Additionally, the @HouseDemocrats plan creates a temporary Federal Pandemic Unemployment Compensation of $600 a week for any worker affected by #COVID19.

name: Rep. Tony C√°rdenas
tweet_text: Our bill focuses on supporting working families and builds on the Families First Coronavirus Response Act by expanding paid sick days and family medical leave to ensure workers have access to these crucial benefits.

name: Rep. Tony C√°rdenas
tweet_text: The Take Responsibility for Workers and Families Act puts money directly into the pockets of American families. Our plan provides $1,500 of immediate assistance per individual and up to $7,500 for a family of five.

name: Rep. Tony C√°rdenas
tweet_text: Over the weekend, @senatemajldr McConnell put forward a coronavirus response bill that prioritizes corporations, not American workers. The @HouseDemocrats plan we released is about protecting American families, supporting healthcare workers, and preventing the spread of #COVID19.
